title: AHS 1984 Episode 4 Review & Synopsis
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: yes the true horror of this ep was Birdie putting the Jelly and peanut butter on the same side.Shit that nightmares are made of.
Poor poor Xavier, he was the only one who cared to save Birdie and had to be the one to take her out of her misery. I got a little choked up there.
The wrestling play by play has me IN TEARS. This has to be one of THE BEST commentaries of this episode.  And that peanut butter and jelly on the same bread is haunting. I shiver at the thought.
This was really funny how you did the boxing thing with Jingles and The Night Stalker

I loved this episode this season is fantastic and is my second favourite season but with 6 more episodes left it could reach no.1, loved the boxing commentary lol I hope when Donna's backstory is revealed next week that we get to see some of her interviews with different convicted killers possibly one from AHS past?
description:
